summary: A woman urges her daughter to get married. And when her daughter does, she doesn't think that she made a good choice. So she goes out and hires a killer to kill her son-in-law.
cast: Joanna Kerns|Christine Elise|Grant Show|Jessica Walter|Sherman Augustus|David Spielberg|Kristen Dalton|Jeanette O'Connor|Michael Covert|Eric Robertson|Annabelle Weenick|Giselle Fernandez|Jeff Olson|Alan Gregory|Douglas Caputo|Joey Miyashima|Nancy Peterson|Michael Flynn|Melissa Pace-Tanner|George Sullivan|Jeffrey Hanson|Gerald Henderson|Caitlin E.J. Meyer
keywords: murder|marriage|mother daughter relationship|hitman|based on true story
title: Falso asesinato
